Signing this message can be dangerous. T: Signing this message can be dangerous. This signature could potentially perform any operation on your account's behalf, including granting complete control of your account and all of its assets to the requesting site. Testnet mode changes the interface to al: Der Testnet-Modus verändert die Oberfläche, damit Sie mit unterstützten Testnetzen kommunizieren können.
The API key can be found in the Firebloc: The API key can be found in the Fireblocks console
The BTC address could not be found for t: The BTC address could not be found for the connected vault account. Ensure your vault account has BTC wallet with a SEGWIT address format configured.
The Base Fee is set by the network and c: The Base Fee is set by the network and changes frequently. Any difference between the set Max Base Fee and the actual Base Fee will be refunded.
The Priority Fee is an incentive paid to: The Priority Fee is an incentive paid to network operators to prioritize processing of this transaction.
The inputs of this transaction are great: The inputs of this transaction are greater than the output. Continuing will cause you to lose funds associated with this UTXO.
The provided chainID does not match the: The provided chainID does not match the selected network. Pressing “Continue” will reject the transaction. Please switch networks and try again.
The secret key can be assigned by the Fi: The secret key can be assigned by the Fireblocks workspace admin

This address already exists in the addre: This address already exists in the address book
This enables us to develop improvements: Das ermöglicht es uns, Verbesserungen zu entwickeln und Ihre Erfahrung zu erweitern. Weitere Informationen finden Sie in unseren <typography>Datenschutzbestimmungen</typography>. Sie können sich auf der Einstellungsseite jederzeit abmelden.
This is your secret recovery phrase. Wri: This is your secret recovery phrase. Write it down, and store it in a secure location.
